In a quiet village, there lived a peculiar dog named Rusty. Unlike other dogs, he never barked, leading villagers to believe he was mute. One stormy night, a thief crept into the village, but Rusty remained silent. As the thief approached the baker's shop, Rustyâ€™s keen eyes caught a glimpse of the intruder. Instead of barking, he stealthily followed the thief, tail low, until they reached the edge of the village. Suddenly, Rusty lunged, startling the thief who dropped the stolen goods. The villagers woke to find Rusty standing proudly, a silent guardian who had protected them in his own way.
